1.name: When Worlds Collide
1.description: As a new star and planet hurtle toward a doomed Earth, a small group of survivalists frantically work to complete the rocket which will take them to their new home.

2.name: A Streetcar Named Desire
2.description: Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.

3.name: Ace in the Hole
3.description: A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to rekindle his career, but the situation quickly escalates into an out-of-control circus.

4.name: Alice in Wonderland
4.description: Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.

5.name: The African Queen
5.description: In WWI Africa, a gin-swilling riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack an enemy warship.

6.name: The Day the Earth Stood Still
6.description: An alien lands and tells the people of Earth that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets.

7.name: The Thing from Another World
7.description: Scientists and American Air Force officials fend off a bloodthirsty alien organism while at a remote arctic outpost.

8.name: Strangers on a Train
8.description: A psychopath forces a tennis star to comply with his theory that two strangers can get away with murder.

9.name: Teresa
9.description: A reluctant soldier, Peter, serves in Italy during WWII. He marries a local girl named Teresa and brings her to the US.

10.name: An American in Paris
10.description: Three friends struggle to find work in Paris. Things become more complicated when two of them fall in love with the same woman.

11.name: A Place in the Sun
11.description: A poor boy gets a job working for his rich uncle and ends up falling in love with two women.

12.name: Quo Vadis
12.description: Fierce Roman commander Marcus Vinicius becomes infatuated with beautiful Christian hostage Lygia and begins questioning the tyrannical leadership of the despot Emperor Nero.

13.name: Detective Story
13.description: On one day in the 21st Precinct squad room, assorted characters form a backdrop for the troubles of hard-nosed Detective Jim McLeod.

14.name: Pandora and the Flying Dutchman
14.description: A seductive woman falls in love with a mysterious ship's captain.

15.name: The Dark Man
15.description: A killer called 'The Dark Man' commits double murder. This is witnessed by the young aspiring actress Molly Lester. The Dark Man tries everything to put Molly out of the way. Detective ...                See full summary »

16.name: Scrooge
16.description: Old bitter miser Ebenezer Scrooge (Alastair Sim) is given a chance for redemption when he is haunted by three ghosts on Christmas Eve.

17.name: Decision Before Dawn
17.description: As the US Army approaches Nazi Germany, they recruit German prisoners to spy behind German lines.

18.name: People Will Talk
18.description: Dr. Noah Praetorius falls in love with Debra, a student who finds out that she is pregnant by her old boyfriend.

19.name: Show Boat
19.description: The daughter of a riverboat captain falls in love with a charming gambler, but their fairytale romance is threatened when his luck turns sour.

20.name: Along the Great Divide
20.description: A U.S. Marshall and two deputies rescue a cattle rustler from a lynch mob led by a local cattle baron convinced that the rustler also killed his son.

21.name: Journal d'un curé de campagne
21.description: A young priest taking over the parish at Ambricourt tries to fulfill his duties even as he fights a mysterious stomach ailment.

22.name: Fixed Bayonets!
22.description: The story of a platoon during the Korean War. One by one Corporal Denno's superiors are killed until it comes to the point where he must try to take command responsibility.

23.name: The Tragedy of Othello: The Moor of Venice
23.description: The Moorish General Othello is manipulated into thinking that his new wife Desdemona has been carrying on an affair with his Lieutenant Michael Cassio when in reality, it is all part of the scheme of a bitter Ensign named Iago.

24.name: Royal Wedding
24.description: A brother and sister dance act encounter challenges and romance when booked in London during the Royal Wedding.

25.name: The Lavender Hill Mob
25.description: A meek bank clerk who oversees the shipment of bullion joins with an eccentric neighbor to steal gold bars and smuggle them out of the country as miniature Eiffel Towers.

26.name: Captain Horatio Hornblower R.N.
26.description: During the Napoleonic wars, a British Navy Captain has adventures in Central American waters.

27.name: Circle of Danger
27.description: Clay Douglas an American, comes to Britain, to find out the truth behind his brothers death during a commando operation in occupied France. After tracking down the surviving members of the ...                See full summary »

28.name: Atoll K
28.description: Stan inherits a yacht and a South Pacific island. Ollie and Stan sail there with 2 other men. They shipwreck on a new atoll and settle there. An ex-fiancee joins them. They declare an independent nation and problems arise.

29.name: Hakuchi
29.description: A Japanese veteran, driven partially mad from the war, travels to the snowy island of Hokkaido where he soon enters a love triangle with his best friend and a disgraced woman.

30.name: Distant Drums
30.description: After destroying a Seminole fort, American soldiers and their rescued companions must face the dangerous Everglades and hostile Indians in order to reach safety.

31.name: Miracolo a Milano
31.description: An open hearted and unrelentingly energetic orphan struggles to make the best out of his life on the streets of Milan.

32.name: Man in the Saddle
32.description: A private deadly feud ensues when ruthless wealthy rancher Will Isham attempts a takeover of small rancher Owen Merritt's land and marries Owen's old flame, Laure Bidwell.

33.name: Rawhide
33.description: A stagecoach stop employee and a stranded woman traveller find themselves at the mercy of four desperate outlaws intent on robbing the next day's gold shipment.

34.name: His Kind of Woman
34.description: A deported gangster's plan to re-enter the USA involves skulduggery at a Mexican resort, and gambler Dan Milner is caught in the middle.

35.name: David and Bathsheba
35.description: After King David sees the beautiful Bathsheba bathing from the palace roof, he enters into an adulterous affair which has tragic consequences for his family and Israel.

36.name: The Desert Fox: The Story of Rommel
36.description: The story of the final years of the respected World War II German general, Erwin Rommel.

37.name: The Man in the White Suit
37.description: An altruistic chemist invents a fabric which resists wear and stain as a boon to humanity, but big business and labor realize it must be suppressed for economic reasons.

38.name: Operation Pacific
38.description: During WWII, a submarine's second in command inherits the problem of torpedoes that don't explode. When on shore, he is eager to win back his ex-wife.

39.name: Westward the Women
39.description: A trail guide escorts a group of women from Chicago to California to marry men that have recently began settling there.

40.name: Awaara
40.description: Raju lives as a derelict as a result of being estranged from his bitter father, a district judge, who threw Raju's mother out of the house years ago. Raju shacks up with a Dacoit (...                See full summary »

41.name: The River
41.description: Three adolescent girls growing up in Bengal, India, learn their lessons in life after falling for an older American soldier.

42.name: The Prowler
42.description: When Susan Gilvray reports a prowler outside her house police officer Webb Garwood investigates and sparks fly. If only her husband wasn't in the way.

43.name: The Red Badge of Courage
43.description: Truncated adaptation of Stephen Crane's novel about a Civil War Union soldier who stuggles to find the courage to fight in the heat of battle.

44.name: Death of a Salesman
44.description: An over-the-hill salesman faces a personal turning point when he loses his job and attempts to make peace with his family.

45.name: M
45.description: In this Americanization of the 1931 German thriller, both the police and the criminal underworld stalk a mysterious killer who preys on small children.

46.name: Another Man's Poison
46.description: A mystery writer becomes involved in a tangled web of murderous deception not unlike the plots of her novels.

47.name: The Steel Helmet
47.description: A ragtag group of American stragglers battles against superior Communist troops in an abandoned Buddhist temple during the Korean War.

48.name: No Highway
48.description: An aeronautical engineer predicts that a new model of plane will fail catastrophically and in a novel manner after a specific number flying hours.

49.name: On Dangerous Ground
49.description: Rough city cop Jim Wilson is disciplined by his captain and is sent upstate, to a snowy mountain town, to help the local sheriff solve a murder case.

50.name: Vengeance Valley
50.description: The sons of a Colorado cattle baron, one biological and the other adopted, resent one another and fight for control of their father's cattle empire.
